TextBody:
Hello Lucas,

My name is Ramon with Netwrix Technical Support and I have been assigned to this case. Would you be available to schedule a remote session to look into the Excel behaving strangely when policy is enabled issue on Thursday 4/17/2025 at 14h BRT?

Please let me know.

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer
